thread.title: Odisha Panchayat Election Results 2017-Live Updates: BJD leads, BJP follows, Congress distant third
thread.title_full: Odisha Panchayat Election Results 2017-Live Updates: BJD leads, BJP follows, Congress distant third - The Financial Express

author: FE Online
title: Odisha Panchayat Election Results 2017-Live Updates: BJD leads, BJP follows, Congress distant third
text:
As per reports, Bharatiya Janata Party is learnt to have won nearly 306 seats, ten times its tally in the last election. (Source: PTI) The Odisha state election commission will soon declare the results of the elections of panchayats and zilla parishad seats in the state. 851 seats of Odisha had gone to polls between February 13 and 21. Many districts, including Malkangiri, Bolangir, Sambalpur, Bargarh, Deogarh and Mayurbhanj had seen bumper polling in the state. As per reports, Bharatiya Janata Party is learnt to have won nearly 306 seats, ten times its tally in the last election. While the Congress â€™ performance has gone down, falling from 126 to 66, the ruling BJD also saw a fall from 651 to 460 seats.
As per state election commission, polling was held in 174 Zilla Parishad constituencies spread across 29 districts except Deogarh. As many as 53,62,814 voters participated in polls with their Zilla Parishad, Samiti and Ward members, along with Sarpanchs. The Zilla Parishad candidate of Polsara has already won the seat uncontested.
Earlier, Prime Minister Narendra Modi thanked the people of Odisha for their unprecedented support during the panchayati elections in the state.
Here are the live updates:
12.42 pm: Total polled Zilla Parishad zones-849; Tally so far: #BJD wins 43 ZP, # BJP -17, #Congress-2, Others-2 #Odisha
12.37 pm: #BJD wins 10 Zilla Parishad zones in #Puri, 1 zone goes to independent candidate #Odisha
12.35 pm: BJD wins 2 Zilla Parishad zones in #Bargarh, BJP-3
12.30pm: Congress wins 2 Zilla Parishad zones in Jharsuguda
12.25 pm: BJD wins 5 Zilla Parishad zones in #Boudh, BJP-2
12.20 pm: BJD wins 10 Zilla Parishad zones in Balasore, BJP-6 Odisha
12.15 pm: BJD wins 10 Zilla Parishad zones in Puri Odisha
12.10 pm: Total polled Zilla Parishad zones-849; tally so far: #BJD wins 35 ZP, #BJP-15, #Congress-2, Others 1 #Odisha
12.05 pm: Total polled Zilla Parishad zones-849; tally so far: #BJD wins 35 ZP, #BJP-15, #Congress-2, Others 1 #Odisha
12.01 pm: PanchayatPollResults: BJP wins 6 ZP zones in Balasore; BJD-2
11.59 am: PanchayatPollResults: Total polled Zilla Parishad zones-849; Tally so far: BJD wins 17 ZP, BJP-8, Congress-0, Others 1 Odisha
11.57 am: PanchayatPollResults: Total polled Zilla Parishad zones-849; Tally so far: BJD wins 5 ZP, BJP-3, Congress-0, Others 1 Odisha
11.50 am: PanchayatPollResults: Total polled Zilla Parishad zones-849; Trend so far: BJD wins 4 ZP, BJP-3, Congress-0, Others 1 Odisha
11.40 am: PanchayatPollResults: Total polled Zilla Parishad zones-849; Trend so far: BJD wins 1 ZP, BJP-3, Congress-0, Others 1 Odisha
11.30 am: BJP candidates win zone 36, 37, 38 Zilla Parishad seats under Balasore Sadar block Panchayat Poll Results Odisha
11.15 am: Independent candidate Jeevan Krushna Samantray wins zone-4 ZP seat under Cuttack Sadar block Panchayat Poll Results
